DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate association soluble insulin receptor dysfunction , cardiorespiratory fitness , HIV associate neurocognitive disorder ( HAND ) . Those volunteer participate study two evaluation study entry include dual x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) densitometry , anthropometry , neurocognitive testing , blood urine sample metabolic testing , cardiorespiratory fitness test . DEXA conduct Endocrinology Unit University Hospital , Medical Center ( letter support include ) . The cardiorespiratory fitness test conduct AIDS Clinical Trials Unit ( ACTU ) project , University Puerto Rico , Medical Sciences Campus , Puerto Rico Clinical Translational Research Consortium . Then , participant invite participate 6-week , 3 days/week individualized exercise program . The exercise program conduct University Puerto Rico Medical Sciences Campus . After completion exercise program , study entry evaluation repeat . The duration study take approximately 10 week .
DOC.brief_title: Cognition Metabolism Exercise Among Women Living With HIV Puerto Rico
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study determine effect low volume high intensity interval training ( HIIT ) exercise intervention cardio-respiratory fitness ( CR-fitness ) , insulin resistance , cognitive function among normally active physically untrained HIV+ Hispanic woman . The primary hypothesis HIIT improve : 1 ) CR-fitness group ( HIV+ HIV- ) , 2 ) insulin sensitivity group HIV+ woman , 3 ) cognitive function determine hippocampal function HIV+ woman HAND . Participants receive 2 week , 6 session 8 x 60 second cycle bout elicit approximately 80 % maximal heart rate 60 second rest bout receive 4 week , 12 session 10 x 60 second cycle bout elicit approximately 90 % maximal heart rate 60 second rest bout . Then , participant evaluate CR-fitness , insulin resistance , anthropometry , neurocognitive function test . Participants undergo intervention ( describe ) design normally active physically untrained HIV+ Hispanic woman , one ( n=15 ) without ( n=15 ) neurocognitive impairment & HIV- control ( n=15 ) . After HIIT intervention , measurement CR-fitness , insulin resistance , cognitive function include hippocampal function use memory island test obtain , well CR-fitness , anthropometry , DEXA densitometry , blood urine sample metabolic test . The ultimate goal improve understanding mechanism exercise influence neurocognitive function ; thus , provide potential non-pharmacological alternative prevent , control reduce chronic incapacitating disease HIV+ Hispanic adult .
DOC.criteria: 1 . HIVseropositive woman ≥21 year lymphocytes differentiate cell 4 ( CD4 ) cell count nadir last year ≤500 cells/mm3 , viral load ≥1,000 copies/mL despite highly active antiretroviral therapy ( HAART ) . 2 . Education level ≥9th grade , since minimum require neuropsychological ( NP ) test . All HIVseropositive HIVseronegative participant test vocabulary reading premorbid cognitive function describe . 3 . Nondrug abuser ; define < 5 exposure lifetime drug ( opiates/heroin , methamphetamine , cocaine/crack , speed ball ) . For purpose study neither tobacco nicotine use consider drug . 4 . No diagnosis diabetes use hypoglycemic agent . 1 . HIV+ woman men < 21 year old CD4 cell count > 500 cells/mm3 and/or viral load < 1,000 copies/mL . 2 . Opportunistic infection central nervous system ( CNS ) determine neurological evaluation neuroimaging . ( Neuroimaging study , need , performed part patient care hence include budget item proposal . ) 3 . History diabetes use hypoglycemic agent . 4 . Underlying neurologic and/or neuropsychiatric disorder cerebrovascular event ; history meningitis/encephalitis , CNS opportunistic infection , seizure ; head trauma ( < 6 month loss consciousness > 1 hr ) ; cerebral palsy ; neuropsychiatric condition judgment investigator may affect study . 5 . Active systemic infection illness , judgment investigator may affect study . 6 . Pregnant/nursing mother woman recent birth ( < 60 day ) . 7 . Substance abuse : active drug use participant screen urine toxicology active alcohol abuse score > 3 point Michigan Alcoholism Screening Test ( MAST ) screen blood sample alcohol level ( Seltzer 1975 ) . 8 . Patients unwilling give inform consent incapable understanding informed consent . 9 . Education le 9th grade .
